metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1000825 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: FreeCol version <= nightly-2018-08-22 contains a XML External Entity (XXE) vulnerability in FreeColXMLReader parser that can result in Disclosure of confidential data, denial of service, SSRF, port scanning. This attack appear to be exploitable via Freecol file.

criterions.comment: freecol package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.11.6+dfsg2-3').
